gl_features.json: angle::Features and workarounds for GL driver bugs and other issues.

features.name: avoid_1_bit_alpha_texture_formats
description: Issue with 1-bit alpha framebuffer formats

features.name: RGBA4_is_not_supported_for_color_rendering
description: GL_RGBA4 is not color renderable

features.name: allow_ETC_formats
description: Enable ETC2/EAC on desktop OpenGL

features.name: allow_astc_formats
description: Enable ASTC on desktop OpenGL

features.name: does_SRGB_clears_on_linear_framebuffer_attachments
description: Issue clearing framebuffers with linear attachments when GL_FRAMEBUFFER_SRGB is enabled

features.name: do_while_GLSL_causes_GPU_hang
description: Some GLSL constructs involving do-while loops cause GPU hangs

features.name: vertex_ID_does_not_include_base_vertex
description: gl_VertexID in GLSL vertex shader doesn't include base vertex value

features.name: finish_does_not_cause_queries_to_be_available
description: glFinish doesn't cause all queries to report available result

features.name: always_call_use_program_after_link
description: Always call useProgram after a successful link to avoid a driver bug

features.name: unpack_overlapping_rows_separately_unpack_buffer
description: In the case of unpacking from a pixel unpack buffer, unpack overlapping rows row by row

features.name: pack_overlapping_rows_separately_pack_buffer
description: In the case of packing to a pixel pack buffer, pack overlapping rows row by row

features.name: initialize_current_vertex_attributes
description: During initialization, assign the current vertex attributes to the spec-mandated defaults

features.name: emulate_abs_int_function
description: abs(i) where i is an integer returns unexpected result

features.name: add_and_true_to_loop_condition
description: Calculation of loop conditions in for and while loop has bug

features.name: unpack_last_row_separately_for_padding_inclusion
description: When uploading textures from an unpack buffer, some drivers count an extra row padding

features.name: pack_last_row_separately_for_padding_inclusion
description: When uploading textures from an pack buffer, some drivers count an extra row padding

features.name: emulate_isnan_float
description: Using isnan() on highp float will get wrong answer

features.name: use_unused_blocks_with_standard_or_shared_layout
description: Unused std140 or shared uniform blocks will be treated as inactive

features.name: remove_invariant_and_centroid_for_ESSL3
description: Fix spec difference between GLSL 4.1 or lower and ESSL3

features.name: rewrite_float_unary_minus_operator
description: Using '-<float>' will get wrong answer

features.name: emulate_atan_2_float
description: atan(y, x) may return a wrong answer

features.name: reapply_UBO_bindings_after_using_binary_program
description: Some drivers forget about UBO bindings when using program binaries

features.name: emulate_max_vertex_attrib_stride
description: Some drivers return 0 when MAX_VERTEX_ATTRIB_STRIED queried

features.name: dont_initialize_uninitialized_locals
description: Initializing uninitialized locals caused odd behavior in a few WebGL 2 tests

features.name: clamp_point_size
description: The point size range reported from the API is inconsistent with the actual behavior

features.name: dont_use_loops_to_initialize_variables
description: For loops used to initialize variables hit native GLSL compiler bugs

features.name: clamp_frag_depth
description: gl_FragDepth is not clamped correctly when rendering to a floating point depth buffer

features.name: rewrite_repeated_assign_to_swizzled
description: Repeated assignment to swizzled values inside a
GLSL user-defined function have incorrect results

features.name: disable_blend_func_extended
description: ARB_blend_func_extended does not pass the tests

features.name: unsized_SRGB_read_pixels_doesnt_transform
description: Drivers returning raw sRGB values instead of linearized values when calling glReadPixels
on unsized sRGB texture formats

features.name: query_counter_bits_generates_errors
description: Drivers generate errors when querying the number of bits in timer queries

features.name: dont_relink_programs_in_parallel
description: Relinking a program in parallel is buggy

features.name: disable_worker_contexts
description: Some tests have been seen to fail using worker contexts

features.name: limit_webgl_max_texture_size_to_4096
description: Limit webgl max texture size to 4096 to avoid frequent
out-of-memory errors

features.name: limit_max_MSAA_samples_to_4
description: Various rendering bugs have been observed when using higher MSAA counts

features.name: allow_clear_for_robust_resource_init
description: Using glClear for robust resource initialization is buggy on some drivers and leads to
texture corruption. Default to data uploads except on MacOS where it is very slow.

features.name: clamp_array_access
description: Clamp uniform array access to avoid reading invalid memory.

features.name: reset_TexImage2D_base_level
description: Reset texture base level before calling glTexImage2D to
work around pixel comparison failure.

features.name: clear_to_zero_or_one_broken
description: Clears when the clear color is all zeros or ones do not work.

features.name: limit_max_3d_array_texture_size_to_1024
description: Limit max 3d texture size and max array texture layers to 1024 to avoid system hang

features.name: adjust_src_dst_region_for_BlitFramebuffer
description: Many platforms have issues with blitFramebuffer when the parameters are large.

features.name: clip_src_region_for_BlitFramebuffer
description: Issues with blitFramebuffer when the parameters don't match the framebuffer size.

features.name: RGB_DXT1_textures_sample_zero_alpha
description: Sampling BLACK texels from RGB DXT1 textures returns transparent black on Mac.

features.name: unfold_short_circuits
description: Mac incorrectly executes both sides of && and || expressions when they should
short-circuit.

features.name: emulate_primitive_restart_fixed_index
description: When GL_PRIMITIVE_RESTART_FIXED_INDEX is not available, emulate it with
GL_PRIMITIVE_RESTART and glPrimitiveRestartIndex.

features.name: set_primitive_restart_fixed_index_for_draw_arrays
description: Some drivers discard vertex data in DrawArrays calls when the fixed primitive restart
index is within the number of primitives being drawn.

features.name: remove_dynamic_indexing_of_swizzled_vector
description: Dynamic indexing of swizzled l-values doesn't work correctly on various platforms.

features.name: pre_add_texel_fetch_offsets
description: Intel Mac drivers mistakenly consider the parameter position of nagative vaule as invalid
even if the sum of position and offset is in range, so we need to add workarounds by
rewriting texelFetchOffset(sampler, position, lod, offset) into texelFetch(sampler,
position + offset, lod).

features.name: regenerate_struct_names
description: All Mac drivers do not handle struct scopes correctly. This workaround overwrites a struct
name with a unique prefix.

features.name: read_pixels_using_implementation_color_read_format_for_norm16
description: Quite some OpenGL ES drivers don't implement readPixels for RGBA/UNSIGNED_SHORT from
EXT_texture_norm16 correctly

features.name: flush_before_delete_texture_if_copied_to
description: Some drivers track CopyTex{Sub}Image texture dependencies incorrectly. Flush
before glDeleteTextures in this case

features.name: rewrite_row_major_matrices
description: Rewrite row major matrices in shaders as column major as a driver bug workaround

features.name: disable_draw_buffers_indexed
description: Disable OES_draw_buffers_indexed extension.

features.name: disable_semaphore_fd
description: Disable GL_EXT_semaphore_fd extension

features.name: disable_timestamp_queries
description: Disable GL_EXT_disjoint_timer_query extension

features.name: decode_encode_SRGB_for_GenerateMipmap
description: Decode and encode before generateMipmap for srgb format textures.

features.name: emulate_CopyTexImage2D
description: Replace CopyTexImage2D with TexImage2D + CopyTexSubImage2D.

features.name: emulate_CopyTexImage2D_from_renderbuffers
description: CopyTexImage2D spuriously returns errors on iOS when copying from renderbuffers.

features.name: disable_GPU_switching_support
description: Disable GPU switching support (use only the low-power GPU) on older MacBook Pros.

features.name: disable_native_parallel_compile
description: Do not use native KHR_parallel_shader_compile even when available.

features.name: emulate_pack_skip_rows_and_pack_skip_pixels
description: GL_PACK_SKIP_ROWS and GL_PACK_SKIP_PIXELS are ignored in Apple's OpenGL driver.

features.name: clamp_msc_rate
description: Some drivers return bogus values for GetMscRate, so we clamp it to 30Hz

features.name: bind_transform_feedback_buffer_before_bind_buffer_range
description: Bind transform feedback buffers to the generic binding point before calling
glBindBufferBase or glBindBufferRange.

features.name: disable_sync_control_support
description: Speculative fix for issues on Linux/Wayland where exposing GLX_OML_sync_control renders
Chrome unusable

features.name: keep_buffer_shadow_copy
description: Maintain a shadow copy of buffer data when the GL API does not permit reading data back.

features.name: set_zero_level_before_GenerateMipmap
description: glGenerateMipmap fails if the zero texture level is not set on some Mac drivers.

features.name: promote_packed_formats_to_8_bit_per_channel
description: Packed color formats are buggy on Macs with AMD GPUs

features.name: init_fragment_output_variables
description: No init gl_FragColor causes context lost

features.name: shift_instanced_array_data_with_offset
description: glDrawArraysInstanced is buggy on certain new Mac Intel GPUs

features.name: sync_vertex_arrays_to_default
description: Only use the default VAO because of missing support or driver bugs

features.name: sanitize_AMDGPU_renderer_string
description: Strip precise kernel and DRM version information from amdgpu renderer strings.

features.name: unbind_FBO_before_switching_context
description: Imagination GL drivers are buggy with context switching.

features.name: flush_on_framebuffer_change
description: Switching framebuffers without a flush can lead to
crashes on Intel 9th Generation GPU Macs.

features.name: disable_multisampled_render_to_texture
description: Many drivers have bugs when using GL_EXT_multisampled_render_to_texture

features.name: upload_texture_data_in_chunks
description: Upload texture data in <120kb chunks to work around Mac driver hangs and crashes.

features.name: emulate_immutable_compressed_texture_3D
description: Use non-immutable texture allocation to work around a driver bug.

features.name: emulate_RGB10
description: Emulate RGB10 support using RGB10_A2.

features.name: always_unbind_framebuffer_texture_2D
description: Force unbind framebufferTexture2D before binding renderbuffer to work around driver bug.

features.name: disable_texture_clamp_to_border
description: Imagination devices generate INVALID_ENUM when setting the texture border color.

features.name: pass_highp_to_pack_unorm_snorm_builtins
description: packUnorm4x8 fails on Pixel 4 if it is not passed a highp vec4.

features.name: disable_clip_cull_distance
description: Shader compiler does not handle redeclared built-ins.

features.name: supports_fragment_shader_interlock_NV
description: Backend GL context supports NV_fragment_shader_interlock extension

features.name: supports_fragment_shader_ordering_INTEL
description: Backend GL context supports GL_INTEL_fragment_shader_ordering extension

features.name: supports_fragment_shader_interlock_ARB
description: Backend GL context supports ARB_fragment_shader_interlock extension

features.name: supports_shader_framebuffer_fetch_EXT
description: Backend GL context supports EXT_shader_framebuffer_fetch extension

features.name: supports_shader_framebuffer_fetch_non_coherent_EXT
description: Backend GL context supports EXT_shader_framebuffer_fetch_non_coherent extension

features.name: supports_shader_pixel_local_storage_EXT
description: Backend GL context supports EXT_shader_pixel_local_storage extension
